import {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import {Link, NavLink} from "react-router-dom"; function StudentListFunc({students}) { const [student, setStudents] = useState(students); const [name, setName] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { // Call API search name const temp = students.filter(temp => temp.name.includes(name)) setStudents(temp) }, [name]) useEffect(() => { return () => { //clean up <=> componentWillUnmount } }, []) return ( <> setName(e.target.value)}/> { student.map((item, index) => ) }
STT Name Address Point Action
{index} {item.name} {item.address} {item.point}
Bạn có chắc xoá Giao dịch mã :{item.name}
) } export default StudentListFunc;
